body:
Syntax: cast 'lightning bolt' <target>

Lightning bolt strikes your target with a powerful electrical discharge,
dealing substantial damage. This spell is known for its reliability and
high damage output.

Classes: Mage, Sorcerer  
Level: 13 (Mage), 16 (Sorcerer)
Mana Cost: 25
Position: Standing or Fighting

Lightning bolt is often preferred over fireball for its consistency and
slightly lower level requirement. It's an excellent spell for both
solo combat and group situations.

See Also: FIREBALL, SHOCKING GRASP
